query:
UPDATE task t
                SET
                    name = COALESCE($2, t.name),
                    description = COALESCE($3, t.description),
                    completed = COALESCE($4, t.completed)
                WHERE
                    t.id = $1
                    AND t.user_id = $5
                RETURNING
                    t.id,
                    t.project_id,
                    t.name,
                    t.description,
                    t.completed,
                    t.user_id,
                    t.created_at,
                    t.updated_at
